body:
Dear Startup Inc Admin, 
A new *|role|* user has been created at Startup Inc. 
*|nickname|* with email address *|email|* was created in the system.
name: convx-newuser

body:
Dear *|nickname|*, 
Welcome to Startup Inc.
Please verify your email address by clicking [here.] (*|url|*)
name: convx-registration
subject: Registration

body:
Dear *|nickname|*, 
Please change your password by clicking [here.] (*|url|*)
name: convx-forgotpassword

body:
Dear *|nickname|*, 
This email confirms that your password has been changed on *|timestamp|*
If this wasnâ€™t you, please contact us to secure your account.
name: password-change
app-500-new-user
body: A new *|role|* has been created with email address *|email|*
